title: Near Medical District, Granite, Hardwood Floors, Stainless Steel
posting_body: ["Perfectly situated near Downtown in Near Southside, or the Hospital /Medical area, you're only a boot scoot away from all that Fort Worth has to offer!", 'Home to where cattle barons once roamed, rehabilitated homes and historic buildings, this area has no shortage of history and culture.', "Less than 10 minutes (traffic cooperating) to Sundance Square in downtown Fort Worth, where you'll find amazing culture, food, live music and cold drinks.", 'About 10 minutes to Camp Bowie Boulevard, which offers 30 blocks of shopping, dining, and galleries.', 'Features & Amenities', 'Resort-style pool & sun deck', 'Fitness Center with Free Weights  Yoga Area', 'Parking Garage with Controlled Access Garage with Elevator Access', 'Clubroom with Catering Kitchen for Events', 'Coffee Bar and Wi-Fi Available for Residents in the Clubroom', 'Planned Social Activities', 'Granite Countertops', 'Hardwood-like floors', 'Kitchen Islands*', 'Stainless Appliance Package', 'Track-lighting in Kitchens', 'Ceiling Fans', 'Garden Tubs', 'Private Patio/Balcony', 'Call Desiree DASH Apartment Locators', 'show contact info', 'Mention ad D 271']
